data.comment: The match is underway at Schwarzwald-Stadion.
Goal kick for Mainz at Schwarzwald-Stadion.
In the minute 1, Throw-in for Mainz at Schwarzwald-Stadion.
Goal! Jean-Philippe Mateta gives Mainz a 0-1 lead in Freiburg.
That's a fine assist from Leandro Martins.
In the minute 3, Free kick for Mainz in their own half.
Can Mainz get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Freiburg's half?
Throw-in Mainz.
In the minute 5, Ball safe as Mainz is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Important block from the Mainz defence as Nils Petersen fires in a strike for Freiburg.
Freiburg are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 9, Martin Petersen signals a free kick to Freiburg.
Freiburg have been awarded a corner by Martin Petersen.
Mainz's Jean-Philippe Mateta is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 12, Freiburg needs to be cautious. Mainz have an attacking throw-in.
Martin Petersen awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Freiburg close to the penalty box.
In the minute 14, In Freiburg, Lino Tempelmann of Freiburg is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Corner awarded to Freiburg.
Throw-in high up the field for Freiburg in Freiburg.
In the minute 15, Freiburg are coming forward and Christian Gunter gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Martin Petersen awards Mainz a goal kick.
Free kick for Mainz in the half of Freiburg.
In the minute 16, Mainz's Edimilson Fernandes gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Freiburg goal kick.
Mainz awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 17, Freiburg to take a throw-in in Mainz territory.
Martin Petersen signals a Freiburg throw-in in Mainz's half.
Mainz's Jean-Philippe Mateta gets in a shot on goal at Schwarzwald-Stadion. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 20, Mainz have been awarded a corner by Martin Petersen.
Jean-Paul Boetius (Mainz) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Freiburg awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 21, Freiburg push forward at Schwarzwald-Stadion and Jonathan Schmid gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Mainz defence.
Mainz's Leandro Martins misses with an attempt on goal.
Freiburg have a goal kick.
In the minute 22, Vincenzo Grifo of Freiburg gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Freiburg.
Free kick Mainz.
In the minute 24, Attention is being given to Mainz’s Moussa Niakhate and play has been suspended briefly.
Corner awarded to Mainz.
Corner awarded to Mainz.
In the minute 26, Mainz’s Moussa Niakhate is on his feet again at Schwarzwald-Stadion.
In Freiburg a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Free kick Freiburg.
In the minute 29, Jean-Philippe Mateta (Mainz) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Martin Petersen signals a throw-in for Freiburg, close to Mainz's area.
In the minute 31, Throw-in for Mainz in the half of Freiburg.
In Freiburg Mainz attack through Levin Oztunali. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Freiburg.
In the minute 33, Free kick for Freiburg in the half of Mainz.
Goal! Jean-Philippe Mateta extends Mainz's lead to 0-2.
Freiburg pushes forward through Vincenzo Grifo, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 38, Martin Petersen signals a Mainz throw-in in Freiburg's half.
Goal! Mainz extend their lead to 0-3 through Jean-Philippe Mateta.
Jean-Paul Boetius instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 41, Throw-in for Freiburg in the half of Mainz.
Throw-in for Mainz in their own half.
Freiburg to take a throw-in in Mainz territory.
In the minute 45, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Jonathan Schmid gets his shot on target but fails to score for Freiburg.
Freiburg have been awarded a corner by Martin Petersen.
In the minute 45, The 1st half is prolonged by 3 minutes of added time.
Can Freiburg capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Mainz's half?
Throw-in for Mainz at Schwarzwald-Stadion.
In the minute 45, The first-half has ended.
The second half has started at Schwarzwald-Stadion.
In the minute 46, Can Mainz get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Freiburg's half?
The home team have replaced Lino Tempelmann with Nicolas Hofler. This is the first substitution made today by Christian Streich.
In Freiburg a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Ball goes out of play for a Mainz goal kick.
In the minute 52, Martin Petersen signals a Freiburg throw-in in Mainz's half.
Freiburg's Baptiste Santamaria gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Mainz defender.
Corner awarded to Freiburg.
In the minute 53, Freiburg have been awarded a corner by Martin Petersen.
Throw-in for Freiburg in the half of Mainz.
Freiburg have been awarded a corner by Martin Petersen.
In the minute 54, Freiburg attack but Roland Sallai's header doesn't find the target.
Mainz have a goal kick.
Mainz to take a throw-in in Freiburg territory.
In the minute 55, Throw-in for Freiburg in their own half.
Martin Petersen awards the away team a throw-in.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 56, Martin Petersen signals a free kick to Mainz in their own half.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Freiburg to check on Lucas Holer, who is grimacing with pain.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Leandro Martins.
In the minute 58, Leandro Martins has recovered and rejoins the match in Freiburg.
Lucas Holer for Freiburg is back on the field again.
Can Mainz get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Freiburg's half?
In the minute 58, Important block from the Freiburg defence as Jean-Paul Boetius fires in a strike for Mainz.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Jean-Philippe Mateta (Mainz) fires in a shot – and hits the post!
In the minute 60, Martin Petersen awards Freiburg a goal kick.
Martin Petersen signals a free kick to Freiburg.
Freiburg have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 62, Martin Petersen signals a Mainz throw-in in Freiburg's half.
Freiburg drives forward and Roland Sallai gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Freiburg are back in the match in Freiburg. Nils Petersen has scored to make it 1-3.
In the minute 66, Free kick in a good position for Freiburg!
Moussa Niakhate (Mainz) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Freiburg drive upfield and Vincenzo Grifo gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Mainz defender.
In the minute 68, Corner awarded to Freiburg.
In Freiburg Freiburg drive forward through Christian Gunter. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Freiburg have been awarded a corner by Martin Petersen.
In the minute 69, Corner awarded to Freiburg.
Goal kick for Mainz at Schwarzwald-Stadion.
Jean-Philippe Mateta of Mainz is pulled up for offside.
Martin Petersen signals a free kick to Freiburg in their own half.
In the minute 70, Jan Moritz Lichte is making the team's first substitution at Schwarzwald-Stadion with Pierre Kunde replacing Edimilson Fernandes.
Karim Onisiwo is replacing Robin Quaison for Mainz at Schwarzwald-Stadion.
In the minute 71, Karim Onisiwo for Mainz gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Martin Petersen awards Freiburg a goal kick.
Freiburg's Lucas Holer breaks free at Schwarzwald-Stadion. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 72, It's a goal kick for the away team in Freiburg.
Freiburg awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in Mainz.
In the minute 74, Ball safe as Freiburg is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Freiburg in the half of Mainz.
Ball goes out of play for a Mainz goal kick.
In the minute 78, Martin Petersen signals a throw-in for Mainz, close to Freiburg's area.
Leandro Martins for Mainz drives towards goal at Schwarzwald-Stadion. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Throw-in for Freiburg in their own half.
In the minute 80, Goal kick for Mainz at Schwarzwald-Stadion.
Ball safe as Freiburg is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Dong Won Ji is replacing Jean-Philippe Mateta for the away team.
In the minute 81, Martin Petersen awards the away team a throw-in.
Martin Petersen signals a free kick to Freiburg.
In Freiburg, Roland Sallai (Freiburg) misses the target with a header.
In the minute 84, Mainz have a goal kick.
Freiburg make their second substitution with Ermedin Demirovic replacing Lucas Holer.
Throw-in Mainz.
In the minute 86, Mainz awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Corner awarded to Mainz.
Karim Onisiwo for Mainz drives towards goal at Schwarzwald-Stadion. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 88, It's a goal kick for the home team in Freiburg.
Christian Streich (Freiburg) is making a third substitution, with Guus Til replacing Baptiste Santamaria.
Free kick for Mainz in their own half.
Mainz needs to be cautious. Freiburg have an attacking throw-in.
4 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Roland Sallai (Freiburg) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Goal kick for Mainz at Schwarzwald-Stadion.
Mainz are pushing forward but Karim Onisiwo's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Freiburg goal kick.
Mainz's Jean-Paul Boetius attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Martin Petersen awards Freiburg a goal kick.
Mainz awarded a free kick in their own half.
Mainz's Karim Onisiwo breaks free at Schwarzwald-Stadion. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Freiburg have a goal kick.
Jean-Paul Boetius for Mainz gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Freiburg goal kick.
Freiburg are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
The second-half is over. The match ends 1-3.
The away team have replaced Leandro Martins with Luca Kilian. This is the fourth substitution made today by Jan Moritz Lichte.
